doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Mahbubul Alam
doctor.specialty: Pediatric Surgery (Urology, Colorectal, Vascular & Neurosurgery) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Mahbubul Alam is a Pediatric Surgeon in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), BCS (Health), MS (Pediatric Surgery). He is a Assistant Professor, Pediatric Surgery at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Cumilla People's Hospital. Practicing hour of Dr. Mohammad Mahbubul Alam at Cumilla People's Hospital is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Khokon Tower, Medical College Road, Tomsom Bridge, Cumilla
